items.sentence: Tom wouldn\'t let his children use his power tools.
I promise that I won\'t let anything happen to you.
I promised Tom we wouldn\'t sing that song tonight.

I\'d like you to look after my dog while I\'m away.
We\'re pleased with the way things have turned out.
We\'ve been asked to self-quarantine for two weeks.
Tom should be out of the hospital by next Saturday.
Tom threw the car keys to Mary and she caught them.
Tom told Mary that the police were looking for him.
Tom told me he never wanted to work for his father.
I\'m not the only one who thinks Tom is overweight.
I\'ve been coming to work one train earlier lately.
If I\'m reincarnated, I want to come back as a cat.

My father speaks French better than my mother does.

There are cherry trees on both sides of the street.
